name: BB-RSI Crypto Mean Reversion
description: Daily mean-reversion strategy for major crypto spot pairs (BTC/USD, ETH/USD) using Bollinger Bands (20,2σ) and 14-period RSI. Longs are opened when price closes below the lower band and RSI<30, shorts when price closes above the upper band and RSI>70. Positions are exited when price reverts to the 20-day SMA or RSI returns to the 40-60 neutral zone. Risk is capped with fixed-fraction position sizing (2 % of equity at risk), a 1.5 % stop-loss, and a 3 % take-profit.
